remarks: The identity arrow in the category of unital rings is the identity function.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2020.)  (Revised by AV, 10-Mar-2020.)
statement:
ringccat.c $e |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) $.
ringcid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcid.o $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
ringcid.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringcid.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ringcid.s $e |- S = ( Base ` X ) $.
ringcid $p |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = ( _I |` S ) ) $.
